description: Strand units: Spatial awareness, 2-D shapes, 3-D shapes, Symmetry and Angles

teaching.topicContent: Introduction to the hexagonal prism as a 3-D shape with two pentagonal bases and rectangular sides. Explore and also compare the number of faces, edges, and vertices of a pentagonal prism.

Introduction to the cylinder as a 3-D shape with two parallel circular bases and a curved surface. Investigate the properties of cylinders, including the engage in activities that involve measuring and comparing cylinders.

Discuss the concept of nets as 2-D patterns that can be folded to create 3-D shapes. Engage in activities that involve drawing nets for various 3-D shapes. Use nets to construct the corresponding 3-D shapes.

test.description: Put your Strand of Shape knowledge to the test.
